alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Laurens; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 3:18PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Laurens, southeastern Greenville, southwestern Spartanburg and northeastern Anderson Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 318 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles south of Greenville Downtown, or near Donaldson Center, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mauldin, Simpsonville, Five Forks, Fountain Inn, Piedmont, Woodruff, Gray Court, West Pelzer, Donaldson Center and Williamston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Anderson; Laurens; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg
